Package fr.rphstudio.chess.game

Class ChessBoard

java.lang.Object
fr.rphstudio.chess.game.ChessBoard
public class ChessBoard
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to manage all about the ChessBoard

    • getListPawnMove

      public java.util.List<IChess.ChessPosition> getListPawnMove()
      This method is used to get Pawn position list
      Returns:
      List : Pawn ChessPosition list

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece​(int y, int x)
      This method is used to get the piece at a given position with two int (y and x)
      Parameters:
      y - int : corresponding to the row we choose
      x - int : corresponding to the column we choose
      Returns:
      Piece : return the Piece at the given position

    • getPieceType

      public IChess.ChessType getPieceType​(IChess.ChessPosition p) throws EmptyCellException, OutOfBoardException
      This method is used to get a Piece type thanks to a given position
      Parameters:
      p - ChessPosition : position of the piece we want
      Returns:
      ChessType : return the Piece's type
      Throws:
      EmptyCellException - throw when there is no piece at the ChessPosition
      OutOfBoardException - throw when the given ChessPosition is out of the typeTable

    • getPieceColor

      public IChess.ChessColor getPieceColor​(IChess.ChessPosition p) throws EmptyCellException, OutOfBoardException
      This method is used to get a Piece color thanks to a given position
      Parameters:
      p - ChessPosition : position of the piece we want
      Returns:
      ChessColor : return the Piece's color
      Throws:
      EmptyCellException - throw when there is no piece at the ChessPosition
      OutOfBoardException - throw when the given ChessPosition is out of the typeTable

    • getKingState

      public IChess.ChessKingState getKingState​(IChess.ChessColor color)
      This method is used to get the KingState, depending of all the enemies possible movements
      Parameters:
      color - ChessColor : the color of the king we want to find out
      Returns:
      ChessKingState : the King state

    • reinitialise

      public Piece[][] reinitialise()
      This method is used to reinitialise the Game, the Piece table and list of dead pieces
      Returns:
      Piece[][] : the table piece we have generated

    • getNumberOfRemaining

      public int getNumberOfRemaining​(IChess.ChessColor color)
      This method is used to calculate the number of remaining piece depending of the color given in parameter
      Parameters:
      color - ChessColor : the color we choose, White or Black
      Returns:
      int : the number of remaining piece

    • getPieceMoves

      public java.util.List<IChess.ChessPosition> getPieceMoves​(IChess.ChessPosition p)
      This method is used to get the piecesMoves depending of the position of the piece we want to find out
      Parameters:
      p - ChessPosition : the position of the piece
      Returns:
      List : possible move's list

    • testIfWillThreaten

      public java.util.List<IChess.ChessPosition> testIfWillThreaten​(IChess.ChessPosition p)
      This method is used to give the possible moves for a piece after checking if it will threaten the king, then will limit the possible moves
      Parameters:
      p - ChessPosition : the position of the piece
      Returns:
      List : list of possible moves

    • moveTest

      public boolean moveTest​(IChess.ChessPosition oldP, IChess.ChessPosition newP)
      This method is used to test a move for a piece, to know if the king will stay safe, and then confirm that the move is allowed
      Parameters:
      oldP - ChessPosition : piece's old position
      newP - ChessPosition : piece's new position
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the movement is allowed

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece​(IChess.ChessPosition oldP, IChess.ChessPosition newP)
      This method is used to do the movement choose by the player, depending of the position of the piece we choose and the position this pieces will go
      Parameters:
      oldP - ChessPosition : the old piece's position
      newP - ChessPosition : the new piece's position

    • undoMove

      public boolean undoMove()
      This method is used to undo a move
      Returns:
      boolean : true if we allowed the undo action
